title: Signed Multi-Tenant Canary Rollout
tagline: Tenant-specific policy packages roll out with signature and gate checks.
why_it_matters: Lets teams ship policy changes safely without cross-tenant blast radius.
non_technical_script: Each tenant gets its own signed policy package.
Rollout starts with a canary slice and watches guardrail metrics.
If quality regresses, rollback is automatic and lineage is preserved.
technical_script: Bundle signature verification runs before activation for each tenant target.
Canary gate evaluates replay deltas, deny spikes, and incident counters.
Controller persists rollout lineage for compliance and postmortem traceability.
